headline: Martin Marietta Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: RALEIGH, N.C., May 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE: MLM) (“Martin Marietta” or the “Company”) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.79 per share on the Company’s outstanding common stock. This dividend will be payable on June 30, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 2, 2025. headline: 2 Concrete & Aggregates Stocks to Ride Industry Momentum
summary: Federal infrastructure spending should help the Zacks Building Products - Concrete & Aggregates industry players like VMC and MLM. Yet, high rates and expenses are risks.
